sentences.sentence: Participants were categorized according to age.
40 of the course participants are offered employment with the company.
sentences.translation: 参加课程学习的人中有40名得到了在该公司工作的机会。

sentences.sentence: Participants receive free room and board while they are in the academy.
sentences.translation: 参加者在这家学院时，他们得到了免费食宿。
